WITH daily_totals AS (
  SELECT
    DATE((time)) AS event_date,
    
    -- BaÅŸlayan abonelikler iÃ§in toplam gelir
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_started' 
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
      ELSE 0 END
    ), 2) AS daily_subscription_started_total,
    
    -- BaÅŸlayan aboneliklerin sayÄ±sÄ±
    COUNT(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_started' 
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1 ELSE NULL END -- Sadece koÅŸul saÄŸlandÄ±ÄŸÄ±nda saymak iÃ§in 1, aksi halde NULL
    ) AS daily_subscription_started_count,

    -- Yenilenen abonelikler iÃ§in toplam gelir
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_renewed'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
      ELSE 0 END
    ), 2) AS daily_subscription_renewed_total,

    -- Yenilenen aboneliklerin sayÄ±sÄ±
    COUNT(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_renewed'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1 ELSE NULL END
    ) AS daily_subscription_renewed_count,
    
    -- Ä°ade edilen abonelikler iÃ§in toplam tutar (negatif olabilir)
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_refunded'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
      ELSE 0 END
    ), 2) AS daily_refund_amount,

    -- Ä°ade edilen aboneliklerin sayÄ±sÄ±
    COUNT(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_refunded'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1 ELSE NULL END
    ) AS daily_refund_count,
    
    MAX((time)) AS last_event_time

  FROM `mixpanel_focus.mp_master_event`
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
    AND event_name IN ('subscription_started', 'subscription_renewed', 'subscription_renewal_cancelled', 'subscription_refunded')
  GROUP BY event_date
),
all_days_in_range AS (
  SELECT day FROM UNNEST(
    GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from:milli})),
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to:milli}))
    )
  ) AS day
)
SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(adr.day) AS time,
  
  ROUND(
    COALESCE(dt.daily_subscription_started_total, 0) + 
    COALESCE(dt.daily_subscription_renewed_total, 0) + 
    COALESCE(dt.daily_refund_amount, 0), 2
  ) AS total_daily_revenue,

 
FROM all_days_in_range adr
LEFT JOIN daily_totals dt ON adr.day = dt.event_date
ORDER BY time ASC;

-- ðŸ“Š Daily Subscription Renewal COUNT
-- 'subscription_renewed' etkinliÄŸinin gÃ¼nlÃ¼k sayÄ±sÄ±nÄ± gÃ¶sterir

WITH daily_counts AS (
  -- Her gÃ¼n iÃ§in 'subscription_renewed' olayÄ±nÄ±n sayÄ±sÄ±nÄ± hesapla
  SELECT
    DATE((time)) AS event_date,
    COUNT(*) AS daily_renewal_count,
    MAX((time)) AS last_event_time
  FROM `mixpanel_focus.mp_master_event`
  WHERE $__timeFilter((time))
    AND event_name = 'subscription_renewed'
  GROUP BY event_date
),
all_days_in_range AS (
  -- Grafana'dan seÃ§ilen tarih aralÄ±ÄŸÄ±ndaki tÃ¼m gÃ¼nleri oluÅŸtur
  SELECT day FROM UNNEST(
    GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from:milli})),
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to:milli}))
    )
  ) AS day
)
SELECT
  -- Zaman damgasÄ±nÄ± formatla
  CASE
    WHEN adr.day = CURRENT_DATE() THEN COALESCE(dc.last_event_time, TIMESTAMP(DATETIME(adr.day, TIME(12, 0, 0))))
    ELSE TIMESTAMP(DATETIME(adr.day, TIME(23, 59, 59)))
  END AS time,
  
  -- GÃ¼nlÃ¼k yenilenme sayÄ±sÄ±nÄ± gÃ¶ster (eÄŸer veri yoksa 0)
  COALESCE(dc.daily_renewal_count, 0) AS total_daily_renewals

FROM all_days_in_range adr
LEFT JOIN daily_counts dc ON adr.day = dc.event_date
ORDER BY time ASC;

  SELECT day FROM UNNEST(
    GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from:milli})),
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to:milli}))
    )
  ) AS day
)
SELECT
  -- Zaman damgasÄ±nÄ± formatla
  CASE
    WHEN adr.day = CURRENT_DATE() THEN COALESCE(dc.last_event_time, TIMESTAMP(DATETIME(adr.day, TIME(12, 0, 0))))
    ELSE TIMESTAMP(DATETIME(adr.day, TIME(23, 59, 59)))
  END AS time,
  
  -- GÃ¼nlÃ¼k yenilenme sayÄ±sÄ±nÄ± gÃ¶ster (eÄŸer veri yoksa 0)
  COALESCE(dc.daily_renewal_count, 0) AS total_daily_renewals

FROM all_days_in_range adr
LEFT JOIN daily_counts dc ON adr.day = dc.event_date
ORDER BY time ASC;

WITH daily_totals AS (
  SELECT
    DATE((time)) AS event_date,
    
    -- BaÅŸlayan abonelikler iÃ§in toplam gelir
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_started' 
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
      ELSE 0 END
    ), 2) AS daily_subscription_started_total,
    
    -- BaÅŸlayan aboneliklerin sayÄ±sÄ±
    COUNT(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_started' 
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1 ELSE NULL END -- Sadece koÅŸul saÄŸlandÄ±ÄŸÄ±nda saymak iÃ§in 1, aksi halde NULL
    ) AS daily_subscription_started_count,

    -- Yenilenen abonelikler iÃ§in toplam gelir
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_renewed'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
      ELSE 0 END
    ), 2) AS daily_subscription_renewed_total,

    -- Yenilenen aboneliklerin sayÄ±sÄ±
    COUNT(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_renewed'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1 ELSE NULL END
    ) AS daily_subscription_renewed_count,
    
    -- Ä°ade edilen abonelikler iÃ§in toplam tutar (negatif olabilir)
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_refunded'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
      ELSE 0 END
    ), 2) AS daily_refund_amount,

    -- Ä°ade edilen aboneliklerin sayÄ±sÄ±
    COUNT(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_refunded'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1 ELSE NULL END
    ) AS daily_refund_count,
    
    MAX((time)) AS last_event_time

  FROM `mixpanel_focus.mp_master_event`
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
    AND event_name IN ('subscription_started', 'subscription_renewed', 'subscription_renewal_cancelled', 'subscription_refunded')
  GROUP BY event_date
),
all_days_in_range AS (
  SELECT day FROM UNNEST(
    GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from:milli})),
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to:milli}))
    )
  ) AS day
)
SELECT

-- ðŸ“Š Continuous Revenue Panel - Kesintisiz Gelir Takibi
-- Ã–nce rc_initial_purchase_event, rc_trial_converted_event kontrol eder
-- Yoksa subscription_started'den alÄ±r
-- Kesintisiz revenue takibi saÄŸlar

WITH all_days_in_range AS (
  -- Grafana'dan seÃ§ilen tarih aralÄ±ÄŸÄ±ndaki tÃ¼m gÃ¼nleri oluÅŸtur
  SELECT day
  FROM UNNEST(
    GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from:milli})),
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to:milli}))
    )
  ) AS day
),
daily_revenue_data AS (
  -- GÃ¼nlÃ¼k toplam geliri hesapla - Ã¶ncelik sÄ±rasÄ±na gÃ¶re
  SELECT
    DATE(time) AS event_date,
    -- Ã–nce rc eventlerinden revenue al
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE 
        WHEN event_name IN ('rc_initial_purchase_event', 'rc_trial_converted_event')
             AND REGEXP_CONTAINS(TO_JSON_STRING(properties), r'"revenue"')
             AND CAST(REGEXP_EXTRACT(TO_JSON_STRING(properties), r'"revenue":([0-9.]+)') AS FLOAT64) > 0
        THEN CAST(REGEXP_EXTRACT(TO_JSON_STRING(properties), r'"revenue":([0-9.]+)') AS FLOAT64)
        -- EÄŸer rc eventi yoksa subscription_started'den al
        WHEN event_name = 'subscription_started'
             AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
        THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
        -- subscription_renewed'den de al
        WHEN event_name = 'subscription_renewed'
             AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
        THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
        ELSE 0 
      END
    ), 2) AS daily_revenue_usd,
    
    -- Event tÃ¼rlerini say
    SUM(CASE WHEN event_name IN ('rc_initial_purchase_event', 'rc_trial_converted_event') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS rc_event_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_started' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS subscription_started_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_renewed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS subscription_renewed_count,
    
    MAX(time) AS last_event_time

  FROM `mixpanel_scenarios.mp_master_event`
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
    AND event_name IN ('rc_initial_purchase_event', 'rc_trial_converted_event', 'subscription_started', 'subscription_renewed')
  GROUP BY event_date
),
daily_refund_data AS (
  -- Refund verilerini ayrÄ± hesapla
  SELECT
    DATE(time) AS event_date,
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_refunded'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
      THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
      ELSE 0 END
    ), 2) AS daily_refund_amount,
    SUM(CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_refunded' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS refund_count
  FROM `mixpanel_scenarios.mp_master_event`
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
    AND event_name = 'subscription_refunded'
  GROUP BY event_date
)
-- TÃ¼m gÃ¼nleri gÃ¶ster, gelir olmayan gÃ¼nlerde 0 deÄŸeri ver
SELECT
  -- Her gÃ¼n iÃ§in sabit zaman (23:59:59) - Grafana uyumlu
  TIMESTAMP(DATETIME(adr.day, TIME(23, 59, 59))) AS time,
  
  -- Toplam gÃ¼nlÃ¼k revenue (refund dahil)
  ROUND(
    COALESCE(drd.daily_revenue_usd, 0) + 
    COALESCE(dref.daily_refund_amount, 0), 2
  ) AS total_daily_revenue,
  
  -- DetaylÄ± bilgiler
  --COALESCE(drd.daily_revenue_usd, 0) AS gross_revenue,
  --COALESCE(dref.daily_refund_amount, 0) AS refund_amount,
  --COALESCE(drd.rc_event_count, 0) AS rc_event_count,
  --COALESCE(drd.subscription_started_count, 0) AS subscription_started_count,
  --COALESCE(drd.subscription_renewed_count, 0) AS subscription_renewed_count,
  --COALESCE(dref.refund_count, 0) AS refund_count

FROM all_days_in_range adr
LEFT JOIN daily_revenue_data drd ON adr.day = drd.event_date
LEFT JOIN daily_refund_data dref ON adr.day = dref.event_date
ORDER BY time ASC;

    GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from:milli})),
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to:milli}))
    )
  ) AS day
)
SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(adr.day) AS time,
  
  ROUND(
    COALESCE(dt.daily_subscription_started_total, 0) + 
    COALESCE(dt.daily_subscription_renewed_total, 0) + 
    COALESCE(dt.daily_refund_amount, 0), 2
  ) AS total_daily_revenue,

 
FROM all_days_in_range adr
LEFT JOIN daily_totals dt ON adr.day = dt.event_date
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT 
  COUNT(*) AS total_downloads
FROM `mixpanel_notebase.mp_master_event`
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
AND event_name = '$ae_first_open';

WITH daily_totals AS (
  SELECT
    DATE((time)) AS event_date,
    
    -- BaÅŸlayan abonelikler iÃ§in toplam gelir
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_started' 
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
      ELSE 0 END
    ), 2) AS daily_subscription_started_total,
    
    -- BaÅŸlayan aboneliklerin sayÄ±sÄ±
    COUNT(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_started' 
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1 ELSE NULL END -- Sadece koÅŸul saÄŸlandÄ±ÄŸÄ±nda saymak iÃ§in 1, aksi halde NULL
    ) AS daily_subscription_started_count,

    -- Yenilenen abonelikler iÃ§in toplam gelir
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_renewed'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
      ELSE 0 END
    ), 2) AS daily_subscription_renewed_total,

    -- Yenilenen aboneliklerin sayÄ±sÄ±
    COUNT(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_renewed'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1 ELSE NULL END
    ) AS daily_subscription_renewed_count,
    
    -- Ä°ade edilen abonelikler iÃ§in toplam tutar (negatif olabilir)
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_refunded'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
      ELSE 0 END
    ), 2) AS daily_refund_amount,

    -- Ä°ade edilen aboneliklerin sayÄ±sÄ±
    COUNT(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_refunded'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1 ELSE NULL END
    ) AS daily_refund_count,
    
    MAX((time)) AS last_event_time

  FROM `mixpanel_notebase.mp_master_event`
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
    AND event_name IN ('subscription_started', 'subscription_renewed', 'subscription_renewal_cancelled', 'subscription_refunded')
  GROUP BY event_date
),
all_days_in_range AS (
  SELECT day FROM UNNEST(
    GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from:milli})),
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to:milli}))
    )
  ) AS day
)
SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(adr.day) AS time,
  
  ROUND(
    COALESCE(dt.daily_subscription_started_total, 0) + 
    COALESCE(dt.daily_subscription_renewed_total, 0) + 
    COALESCE(dt.daily_refund_amount, 0), 2
  ) AS total_daily_revenue,

 
FROM all_days_in_range adr
LEFT JOIN daily_totals dt ON adr.day = dt.event_date
ORDER BY time ASC;

-- ðŸ“Š Note Created Daily Analysis Query for Grafana

WITH all_days_in_range AS (
  -- Grafana'dan seÃ§ilen tarih aralÄ±ÄŸÄ±ndaki tÃ¼m gÃ¼nleri oluÅŸtur
  SELECT day FROM UNNEST(

      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from:milli})),
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to:milli}))
    )

daily_note_created AS (
  -- GÃ¼nlÃ¼k note_created event sayÄ±larÄ±nÄ± hesapla
  SELECT 
    DATE((time)) AS event_date,
    COUNT(*) AS note_created_count,
    MAX((time)) AS last_event_time
  FROM `mixpanel_notebase.mp_master_event`
  WHERE $__timeFilter((time))
    AND event_name = 'note_created'
  GROUP BY event_date
)
-- TÃ¼m gÃ¼nleri gÃ¶ster, event olmayan gÃ¼nlerde 0 deÄŸeri ver
SELECT 
  -- Her gÃ¼n iÃ§in sabit zaman (23:59:59) - Grafana uyumlu
  TIMESTAMP(DATETIME(adr.day, TIME(23, 59, 59))) AS time,
  COALESCE(dnc.note_created_count, 0) AS daily_note_created_count
FROM all_days_in_range adr
LEFT JOIN daily_note_created dnc ON adr.day = dnc.event_date
ORDER BY time ASC;

-- 1. Ana query: GÃ¼nlÃ¼k note_created sayÄ±larÄ±nÄ± time series olarak gÃ¶sterir (her gÃ¼n iÃ§in tek deÄŸer)

WITH daily_totals AS (
  SELECT
    DATE((time)) AS event_date,
    
    -- BaÅŸlayan abonelikler iÃ§in toplam gelir
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_started' 
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)
      ELSE 0 END
    ), 2) AS daily_subscription_started_total,
    
    -- BaÅŸlayan aboneliklerin sayÄ±sÄ±
    COUNT(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_started'

           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1 ELSE NULL END -- Sadece koÅŸul saÄŸlandÄ±ÄŸÄ±nda saymak iÃ§in 1, aksi halde NULL

    -- Yenilenen abonelikler iÃ§in toplam gelir
    ROUND(SUM(
      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_renewed'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL
      THEN CAST(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') AS FLOAT64)

    -- Ä°ade edilen aboneliklerin sayÄ±sÄ±

      CASE WHEN event_name = 'subscription_refunded'
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.price_usd') IS NOT NULL
           AND JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(properties, '$.mp_lib') IS NOT NULL

    ) AS daily_refund_count,
    
    MAX((time)) AS last_event_time

  FROM `mixpanel_notebase.mp_master_event`
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
    AND event_name IN ('subscription_started', 'subscription_renewed', 'subscription_renewal_cancelled', 'subscription_refunded')

-- ðŸ“Š Notebase $ae_first_open Daily Panel Query for Grafana
-- Bu sorgu notebase uygulamasÄ± iÃ§in gÃ¼nlÃ¼k ilk aÃ§Ä±lÄ±ÅŸ eventlerini analiz eder
-- Grafana SQL Rules'a %100 uyumlu

-- ðŸŽ¯ Daily First App Opens (Time Series Panel iÃ§in)
WITH all_days_in_range AS (
  -- Grafana'dan seÃ§ilen tarih aralÄ±ÄŸÄ±ndaki tÃ¼m gÃ¼nleri oluÅŸtur
  SELECT day FROM UNNEST(
    GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(1754097099489)),
      DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(1756689099489))
    )
  ) AS day
),
daily_first_opens AS (
  -- GÃ¼nlÃ¼k $ae_first_open event sayÄ±larÄ±nÄ± hesapla
  SELECT 
    DATE((time)) AS event_date,
    COUNT(*) AS first_open_count
  FROM `mixpanel_notebase.mp_master_event`
  WHERE (time) >= '2025-08-02T01:11:39Z' AND (time) <= '2025-09-01T01:11:39Z'
    AND event_name = 'app-install'
  GROUP BY event_date
)
-- TÃ¼m gÃ¼nleri gÃ¶ster, event olmayan gÃ¼nlerde 0 deÄŸeri ver
SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(adr.day) AS time,
  COALESCE(dfo.first_open_count, 0) AS daily_first_opens
FROM all_days_in_range adr
LEFT JOIN daily_first_opens dfo ON adr.day = dfo.event_date
ORDER BY time ASC;

-- ðŸ“ Grafana Panel AyarlarÄ±:
-- Panel Type: Time series
-- Query Type: Time series
-- Time field: time
-- Value field: daily_first_opens

-- ðŸ” Veri YapÄ±sÄ± (Notebase):
-- Table: mixpanel_notebase.mp_master_event
-- Event name: "$ae_first_open"
-- Time field: time (milliseconds timestamp)
-- Properties: JSON string iÃ§inde $ae_first_app_open_date bilgisi

-- âš¡ Performans OptimizasyonlarÄ±:
-- âœ… TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(time) >= '2025-08-02T01:11:39Z' AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(time) <= '2025-09-01T01:11:39Z' kullanÄ±ldÄ±
-- âœ… GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY ile Grafana tarih aralÄ±ÄŸÄ± kullanÄ±ldÄ±
-- âœ… LEFT JOIN ile eksik gÃ¼nler 0 olarak gÃ¶steriliyor
-- âœ… JSON extraction sadece gerekli yerde yapÄ±lÄ±yor

-- ðŸ“Š Beklenen Ã‡Ä±ktÄ±:
-- Her gÃ¼n iÃ§in timestamp ve o gÃ¼nkÃ¼ toplam $ae_first_open sayÄ±sÄ±
-- Eksik gÃ¼nlerde 0 deÄŸeri gÃ¶sterilir
-- Grafana'nÄ±n seÃ§tiÄŸi tarih aralÄ±ÄŸÄ± tam olarak uygulanÄ±r

-- ðŸŽ¯ Grafana SQL Rules Compliance:
-- âœ… 1754097099489 ve 1756689099489 kullanÄ±ldÄ±
-- âœ… time >= '2025-08-02T01:11:39Z' AND time <= '2025-09-01T01:11:39Z' WHERE clause'da mevcut
-- âœ… COALESCE(..., 0) ile NULL handling yapÄ±ldÄ±
-- âœ… TIMESTAMP() formatÄ± time series iÃ§in kullanÄ±ldÄ±
-- âœ… ORDER BY time ASC eklendi
-- âœ… Time series ÅŸablonu kullanÄ±ldÄ±
